page.title: 10Coniston Water & Recreation
page.content: {WATER SPORTS:}Coniston Water offers wonderful opportunities for many kinds of water sport. There is a 16kph{speed {limit}over the whole lake, so that speedboats and water-skiing are not allowed. This makes the lake more pleasant to use for{sailing}craft, windsurfers, rowing boats and swimmers. The{fishing}in the lake is very good. There is a{public launching site}with boatyard, cafe, carpark and toilets. At Coniston Hall the{Coniston Sailing {Club}have their launching site and club facilities, from which they run frequent yacht races. The public have access to much of the lake's west shore, and pebbly{beaches}near to fairly shallow water give good opportunities for{swimming}and paddling.
